column.name: [cx]
column.summary: Cartesian X (J2000)

column.name: [cy]
column.summary: Cartesian Y (J2000)

column.name: [cz]
column.summary: Cartesian Z (J2000)

column.name: [htmid]
column.summary: HTM ID (J2000)

column.name: [zoneid]
column.summary: Zone ID

column.name: [seqID]
column.summary: sequential number

column.name: [RA]
column.summary: Right Ascension

column.name: [DEC]
column.summary: Declination

column.name: [pmra]
column.summary: RA proper motion (KIC targets only)

column.name: [pmdec]
column.summary: Dec proper motion (KIC targets only)

column.name: [umag]
column.summary: u-band Sloan magnitude from the Kepler Input Catalog accurate to 0.04 magnitude

column.name: [gmag]
column.summary: g-band Sloan magnitude from the Kepler Input Catalog

column.name: [rmag]
column.summary: r-band Sloan magnitude from the Kepler Input Catalog

column.name: [imag]
column.summary: i-band Sloan magnitude from the Kepler Input Catalog

column.name: [zmag]
column.summary: z-band Sloan magnitude accurate to 0.03 magnitude from the Kepler Input Catalog

column.name: [gredmag]
column.summary: GRed-band Sloan magnitude from the Kepler Input Catalog

column.name: [d51mag]
column.summary: D51 magnitude from the Kepler Input Catalog

column.name: [jmag]
column.summary: 2MASS J-band magnitude. . In some cases KIC values were replaced with values based on cross-correlations performed by (See 2mass_conflict_flag).

column.name: [hmag]
column.summary: 2MASS H-band magnitude. In some cases KIC values were replaced with values based on cross-correlations performed by

column.name: [kmag]
column.summary: 2MASS K-band magnitude. In some cases KIC values were replaced with values based on cross-correlations performed by

column.name: [kepmag]
column.summary: A magnitude computed according to a hierarchical scheme and depends on what pre-existing catalog source is SCP, Tycho 2, or photographic photometry, in order of preferred selection. For SCP stars the magnitude is synthesized the Sloan-like g and r magnitudes according to the following prescription: if one defines 'color' as g - r, then for less than or equal to 0.8 kepmag = 0.8r + 0.2g, while for color greater than 0.8 kepmag = 0.9r + 0.1g. Empirical for presumed constant stars suggest that the r.m.s. for this quantity is slightly larger 0.02 mags. except for very and bright stars.

column.name: [kepler_id]
column.summary: Unique Kepler ID. Also used in Kepler Target Catalog and in naming data files. Note there are 4,374,730 entries in the joined table

column.name: [tmid]
column.summary: A unique identification number which was defined during final processing to identify a 2Mass catalog entry. The identification number is referred to as pts_key/cntr. See the User's Guide to the 2Mass All Sky Data Release, at for information on the pts_key/cntr field.

column.name: [scpid]
column.summary: SCP processing ID (KIC targets only)

column.name: [altid]
column.summary: ID from alternate source catalog (see Alt ID Source entry) (KIC targets only)

column.name: [altsource]
column.summary: Source catalog that was used for deriving stellar parameters (KIC targets only)

column.name: [galaxy]
column.summary: A flag where 0 = star and 1 = galaxy. The original USNO-B catalog codes these with 11 values, depending on the degree that image profile was consistent with a point source. The USNO-B codes were star = 6-11 and galaxy = 0-5. (KIC targets only)

column.name: [blend]
column.summary: Isolated/blended indicator (never used)

column.name: [variable]
column.summary: Constant/variable indicator based on data from the General Catalog of Variable Stars. (Additional catalogs will be in future versions.) (KIC targets only)

column.name: [teff]
column.summary: Derived Effective Temperature accurate to 200 K (KIC targets only)

column.name: [logg]
column.summary: Derived Log10 surface gravity accurate to 0.5 dex (KIC targets only)

column.name: [feh]
column.summary: Derived Log10 Fe/H metallicity accurate to 0.5 dex. (KIC targets only)

column.name: [ebminusv]
column.summary: Derived Excess B-V reddening accurate to 0.1 magnitude (KIC targets only)

column.name: [av]
column.summary: Derived A-V extinction (KIC targets only)

column.name: [radius]
column.summary: Estimated Stellar Radius (solar = 1.0) (KIC targets only)

column.name: [cq]
column.summary: Source of Kepler-band magnitude. (KIC targets only)

column.name: [pq]
column.summary: Photometry quality indicator. (KIC targets only)

column.name: [aq]
column.summary: Astrophysics quality indicator. Placeholder for SCP values not yet determined. (KIC targets only)

column.name: [catkey]
column.summary: Unique integer key to CATKEY database table (not currently available). (KIC targets only)

column.name: [scpkey]
column.summary: Unique integer key to SCPKEY database table (not currently available). (KIC targets only)

column.name: [parallax]
column.summary: Parallax in arcsec (KIC targets only)

column.name: [glon]
column.summary: Galactic Longitude (KIC targets only)

column.name: [glat]
column.summary: Galactic Latitude (KIC targets only)

column.name: [pmtotal]
column.summary: Total proper motion accurate to 20 mas/yr (KIC targets only)

column.name: [grcolor]
column.summary: gmag - rmag color

column.name: [jkcolor]
column.summary: gmag - imag color

column.name: [gkcolor]
column.summary: gmag - Kmag color

column.name: [tm_designation]
column.summary: 2MASS K-band magnitude. In some cases KIC values were replaced with values based on cross-correlations performed by (See 2mass_conflict_flag).
